about_the_game:
Missing that spark your dungeon needs? Perhaps it doesn’t look deadly enough? Why not add some cages, demons, and other deadly delights! You can never go wrong with a dungeon filled with skeletons and portals to other worlds, they are some of the beloved staples of a dangerous and mystery-filled dungeon after all.

Cursed Kingdom Dungeon Tiles is a tile set pack that features items that will give your dungeon map a dark and sinister look, from skeletons to bloody tables and iron maidens. It also comes with animated chests, doors and demonic character walking sprites to add some extra life to it.

Features:

* Autotiles (7x walls, 13 x floors, 2 x animated water)
* Full Tile B sheet (pillars, stairs, cages, tables, stairs, skeletons etc)
* Partial Tile C Bonus - artist pre arranged furniture sheet
* 1 x system window skin
* Animated sheets:
3 x NPC walking sprites (8 color variations each)
7 x monster walking sprites
1 x large monster idle sprite
4 x chests
8 x light sources
3 x regular doors
1 x big door
2 x big portals
* For use in RPG Maker MZ or the engine of your choice!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
detailed_description:
Please Read Before You Buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Cursed Kingdoms Dungeon Tiles" and "RPG Maker MV - Cursed Kingdoms Dungeon Tiles" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!
